name: Miscreated Monster
aura: Increase Ally HP in Arena battles by 33

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 15% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 1 turn if the [Stun] debuff is placed.
skills.name: Meaty Fists

Lvl. 3 Damage +5%

Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 3 turns equal to 25% of the damage inflicted .

skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 3 turns.

Heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP.
Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 3 turns.
